name: aura/framework
description: The Aura Framework package, when combined with a system skeleton, provides a full-stack framework built from Aura component packages.

suggest.aura/autoload: A PSR-0 compliant autoloader, ready for SplClassloader.
suggest.aura/cli: Tools to build command-line controllers, including a CLI context, options management, and input/ouput handlers
suggest.aura/filter: Provides validation and sanitizing for data objects.
suggest.aura/http: Tools to build HTTP response messages
suggest.aura/marshal: Marshals data from any data source into domain objects, including relationships between those object.
suggest.aura/signal: A signal slots / event handler implementation.
suggest.aura/sql: SQL database connection and query tools.
suggest.aura/uri: objects to help you create and manipulate URLs
suggest.aura/view: Template views, two-step views, and view helpers.
suggest.aura/web: A bare-bones web page controller system, including pre- and post-hooks, a response transfer, and context discovery.
